trans-unit.source: How to Configure a Company with the RapidStart Wizard | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: How to Configure a Company with the RapidStart Wizard | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Jak nakonfigurovat společnost pomocí Průvodce RapidStart | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can quickly configure a new company that you have created by using the RapidStart Services configuration wizard.

seg-source.mrk: You can quickly configure a new company that you have created by using the RapidStart Services configuration wizard.

target.mrk: Pomocí průvodce konfigurací služeb RapidStart Services můžete rychle nakonfigurovat novou společnost, kterou jste vytvořili.

trans-unit.source: Configure a Company with the RapidStart Wizard

seg-source.mrk: Configure a Company with the RapidStart Wizard

target.mrk: Konfigurace společnosti s průvodcem RapidStart

trans-unit.source: You can quickly configure a new company that you have created by using the RapidStart Services configuration wizard.

seg-source.mrk: You can quickly configure a new company that you have created by using the RapidStart Services configuration wizard.

target.mrk: Pomocí průvodce konfigurací služeb RapidStart Services můžete rychle nakonfigurovat novou společnost, kterou jste vytvořili.

trans-unit.source: In the following procedure, you have provided the customer with the configuration package, which is then installed on a computer.

seg-source.mrk: In the following procedure, you have provided the customer with the configuration package, which is then installed on a computer.

target.mrk: V následujícím postupu jste zákazníkovi poskytli konfigurační balíček, který je nainstalován v počítači.

trans-unit.source: The customer opens the new company, which contains no customer data.

seg-source.mrk: The customer opens the new company, which contains no customer data.

target.mrk: Zákazník otevře novou společnost, která neobsahuje žádné zákaznické údaje.

trans-unit.source: You or the customer then follows the steps in the RapidStart Services wizard, which are described in this procedure, to provide basic information about the company.

seg-source.mrk: You or the customer then follows the steps in the RapidStart Services wizard, which are described in this procedure, to provide basic information about the company.

target.mrk: Vy nebo zákazník pak postupujete podle pokynů v Průvodci RapidStart Services, které jsou popsány v tomto postupu, abyste poskytli základní informace o společnosti.

trans-unit.source: The wizard imports the configuration package and then applies the package to the company.

seg-source.mrk: The wizard imports the configuration package and then applies the package to the company.

target.mrk: Průvodce importuje konfigurační balíček a poté tento balíček aplikuje na společnost.

trans-unit.source: To configure a new company

seg-source.mrk: To configure a new company

target.mrk: Konfigurace nové společnosti

trans-unit.source: On the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center, choose the **RapidStart Wizard** action.

seg-source.mrk: On the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center, choose the **RapidStart Wizard** action.

target.mrk: V Centru rolí implementátoru služeb RapidStart Services vyberte akci **Průvodce RapidStart**.

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Step 1** FastTab, which contains general information about the new company.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the **Step 1** FastTab, which contains general information about the new company.

target.mrk: Rozbalte pevnou záložku **Krok 1**, která obsahuje obecné informace o nové společnosti.

trans-unit.source: Enter the appropriate information about the new company in the fields.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the appropriate information about the new company in the fields.

target.mrk: Do příslušných polí zadejte příslušné informace o nové společnosti.

trans-unit.source: There is one field that you are required to fill out, **Name**.

seg-source.mrk: There is one field that you are required to fill out, **Name**.

target.mrk: Pole **Název** je povinné.

trans-unit.source: The rest of the fields are optional.

seg-source.mrk: The rest of the fields are optional.

target.mrk: Ostatní pole jsou volitelná.

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Step 2** FastTab, which contains communication and contact information for the new company.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the **Step 2** FastTab, which contains communication and contact information for the new company.

target.mrk: Rozbalte pevnou záložku **Krok 2**, která obsahuje komunikační a kontaktní informace pro novou společnost.

trans-unit.source: Enter the appropriate information about the new company in the fields.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the appropriate information about the new company in the fields.

target.mrk: Do příslušných polí zadejte příslušné informace o nové společnosti.

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Step 3** FastTab, which contains bank account and payment information for the new company.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the **Step 3** FastTab, which contains bank account and payment information for the new company.

target.mrk: Rozbalte pevnou záložku **Krok 3**, která obsahuje bankovní účet a platební údaje pro novou společnost.

trans-unit.source: Enter the appropriate information about the new company in the fields.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the appropriate information about the new company in the fields.

target.mrk: Do příslušných polí zadejte příslušné informace o nové společnosti.

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Step 4** FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the **Step 4** FastTab.

target.mrk: Rozbalte pevnou záložku **Krok 4**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **AssistEdit** button to select the configuration package you want to apply.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **AssistEdit** button to select the configuration package you want to apply.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **AssistEdit** a vyberte konfigurační balíček, který chcete použít.

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration package is displayed.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the configuration package is displayed.

target.mrk: Zobrazí se název konfiguračního balíčku.

trans-unit.source: You can then perform the following actions, in the listed order:

seg-source.mrk: You can then perform the following actions, in the listed order:

target.mrk: Poté můžete provést následující akce v uvedeném pořadí:

trans-unit.source: Apply the configuration by choosing the **Apply Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: Apply the configuration by choosing the **Apply Package** action.

target.mrk: Aplikujte konfiguraci výběrem akce **Použít balíček**.

trans-unit.source: This imports the configuration package and applies the package database data all at the same time.

seg-source.mrk: This imports the configuration package and applies the package database data all at the same time.

target.mrk: Tím se importuje konfigurační balíček a všechna data databáze balíků se aplikují současně.

trans-unit.source: Review the configuration after it has been applied.

seg-source.mrk: Review the configuration after it has been applied.

target.mrk: Po použití zkontrolujte konfiguraci.

trans-unit.source: This option lets you review configuration details and questionnaires provided by the partner and import some master data that is required for your company.

seg-source.mrk: This option lets you review configuration details and questionnaires provided by the partner and import some master data that is required for your company.

target.mrk: Tato možnost umožňuje zkontrolovat podrobnosti konfigurace a dotazníky poskytnuté partnerem a importovat některá hlavní data, která jsou pro vaši společnost požadována.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Configuration Worksheet** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Configuration Worksheet** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Konfigurační sešit**.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [To complete the configuration questionnaire](admin-gather-customer-setup-values.md#to-complete-the-configuration-questionnaire).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [To complete the configuration questionnaire](admin-gather-customer-setup-values.md#to-complete-the-configuration-questionnaire).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Vyplnění konfiguračního dotazníku](admin-gather-customer-setup-values.md#to-complete-the-configuration-questionnaire).

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Step 5** FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the **Step 5** FastTab.

target.mrk: Rozbalte pevnou záložku **Krok 5**.

trans-unit.source: Specify which Role Center that you want to be the default for the new company.

seg-source.mrk: Specify which Role Center that you want to be the default for the new company.

target.mrk: Určete, které Centrum rolí má být výchozí pro novou společnost.

trans-unit.source: Only change your Role Center after you have completed configuration of the company.

seg-source.mrk: Only change your Role Center after you have completed configuration of the company.

target.mrk: Změňte své Centrum rolí až po dokončení konfigurace společnosti.

trans-unit.source: If you have more setup details to consider and modify, first use the configuration worksheet to continue your work.

seg-source.mrk: If you have more setup details to consider and modify, first use the configuration worksheet to continue your work.

target.mrk: Pokud máte více podrobností o nastavení, které je třeba zvážit a upravit, pokračujte v práci nejprve pomocí konfiguračního sešitu.

trans-unit.source: Then, return to the wizard to update your Role Center profile, or choose the **Complete Setup** action.

seg-source.mrk: Then, return to the wizard to update your Role Center profile, or choose the **Complete Setup** action.

target.mrk: Poté se vraťte do průvodce a aktualizujte svůj profil Centra rolí nebo vyberte akci **Dokončit instalaci**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: To verify that the configuration information has been applied to the new company, Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Company Information**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: To verify that the configuration information has been applied to the new company, Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Company Information**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Chcete-li ověřit, zda byly informace o konfiguraci použity pro novou společnost, vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Informace o společnosti** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: The **Company Information** page contains information that you have specified.

seg-source.mrk: The **Company Information** page contains information that you have specified.

target.mrk: Stránka **Informace o společnosti** obsahuje informace, které jste zadali.

trans-unit.source: You have now configured the company and applied data to it.

seg-source.mrk: You have now configured the company and applied data to it.

target.mrk: Nyní jste nakonfigurovali společnost a aplikovali na ni data.

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také

trans-unit.source: [Apply Configurations to New Companies](admin-apply-configuration-to-new-companies.md)

seg-source.mrk: Apply Configurations to New Companies

target.mrk: Aplikování konfigurace pro nové společnosti

trans-unit.source: [Setting Up a Company With RapidStart Services](admin-set-up-a-company-with-rapidstart.md)

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up a Company With RapidStart Services

target.mrk: Založení společnosti pomocí služeb RapidStart

trans-unit.source: [Administration](admin-setup-and-administration.md)

seg-source.mrk: Administration

target.mrk: Správa
